posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: [NNJG]★Kilroy★(WLLKM)
Your Steam ID:STEAM_0:1:25397468 00:24 97 0
Reason: RDM then leave.
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban: one week/idk
What server were you playing?: TTT
Who banned you?: Pharaoh?
Why should we unban you?: i dont even remember rdming anyone, i had only left the server after being killed.

A week was harsh. I'll give you the benefit of the doubt saying you didn't try to rdm him. You made this unban request respectibley and followed the format with.
Plus I would have hated if I was kicked off during spring break.
I'll ask Gash to unban you tonight when I see him.
thank you very much pharaoh, i appreciate you noticing the suffering i would of had to go through. <3
